summary: This release finishes the Glimpse rewrite, so content suggestions now work across all seven phases. You'll also find a new masonry layout for shelves, better mobile formatting for posts, and a unified storage layer with the Amber SDK. Under the hood, most of our background workers have been migrated to the new Infra SDK for better reliability.
